com.cmput301f17t11.cupofjava.Models

Class Habit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301f17t11.cupofjava.Models.Habit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Habit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Handles all properties related to a habit. A habit contains a title, reason, date, frequency. User can find out if habit is followed by another user or not.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
